titleStmt.title: The witch of Edmonton a known true story / composed into a tragi-comedy by divers well-esteemed poets, William Rowley, Thomas Dekker, John Ford, &c.
titleStmt.author: Rowley, William, 1585?-1642?
Dekker, Thomas, ca. 1572-1632.
Ford, John, 1586-ca. 1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Cottrel for Edward Blackmore ...,

notesStmt.note: "Acted by the Princes servants, often at the Cock-Pit in Drury-Lane, once at court with singular applause"
